knimeNode.name: SVM Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node uses a SVM model generated by the SVM learner node to predict the output for given parameters.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses a SVM model generated by the SVM learner node to predict the output for given values. Only the columns that have been used during training are used in the SVM learner. The output table will contain one extra column, which contains the prediction. There is no need to configure this node.

ports.dataOut: The input table, with the prediction column appended to it.
ports.modelIn: The model generated by the SVM Learner
